snippet: The Celtics defeated the Pacers, a potential first-round playoff opponent, and added to their lead in the Atlantic Division.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Boston Celtics defeat Indiana Pacers, 86-72, adding to their lead in the Atlantic Division; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Celtics defeated the Pacers, a potential first-round playoff opponent, and added to their lead in the Atlantic Division.

headline.print_headline: Celtics Slow Down the Pacers and Steady Themselves
headline.seo: Celtics Slow Down the Pacers and Steady Themselves
headline.main: Celtics Slow Down the Pacers and Steady Themselves
